categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Battle of Ord Vaug  (Galactic Civil War)
The Battle of Ord Vaug was fought shortly after the Battle of Endor.
The Alliance of Free Planets liberated a prison colony on the planet Ord Vaug, destroying its defenses.

Having found the two remaining Venerated Ones of Vandelhelm being held prisoner on the planet, the Alliance requested that someone escort them to their homeworld. General Han Solo was picked for the job by General Lando Calrissian.
